title: Classic Anivia Wall size Lvl 1 is larger than Blackfrost Skin
body: Is there any way to fix the correct wall size for Anivia? I can't tell which one should be the correct size. It seems as if the Classic Anivia wall is way too big for lvl 1. I thought I was the only one noticing the wall size difference but I stumbled upon someone else reporting this bug (The imgur link) yet Riot hasn't done anything about it.
